member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.LoggingExtensions
member.summary: The class contains, as you might expect, extension methods for configuring Serilog / Application Insights.

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Logging.Extensions.LoggingExtensions.AddSerilogLogging(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.WebApplicationBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: The method will add Serilog to the logging providers.
member.param: The name (including extension) of the file containing the Serilog Configuration settings.
member.returns: The original instance of for further method chaining.
